VerifyPythonFile.summary: Checks whether the syntax of a Python code snippet is correct.

schema.description: The Python code snippet.

schema.title: SophonResult<PythonVerifyDTO>
schema.description: The data returned.

Syntax.description: The verification result. If the parameter is left empty, the syntax of the code snippet is correct.

StartLineNumber.description: The number that indicates the start line of the error code.

StartColumn.description: The number that indicates the start column of the error code.

EndLineNumber.description: The number that indicates the end line of the error code.

EndColumn.description: The number that indicates the end column of the error code.

Message.description: The error message for the error code.

Severity.description:
The severity level of the error code. Valid values:

*   4: moderate
*   8: serious

491.errorMessage: The parameters of the request interface are wrong. Please verify the parameters and request again.

VerifyPythonFile.title: VerifyPythonFile

VerifyPlaybook.summary: Checks whether the configuration of the playbook is correct and whether the logic of the orchestration is reasonable.

schema.title: 剧本UUID
schema.description:
The playbook UUID.

>  You can call the [DescribePlaybooks](~~DescribePlaybooks~~) operation to query the playbook UUID.

schema.title: 剧本编辑配置
schema.description: The XML configuration of the playbook.
schema.example: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><bpmn:definitions xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:bpmn="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL" xmlns:bpmndi="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/DI" xmlns:dc="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DC" targetNamespace="http://bpmn.io/schema/bpmn" id="Definitions_1"><bpmn:process id="Process_1" isExecutable="false"><bpmn:startEvent id="StartEvent_1"/></bpmn:process><bpmndi:BPMNDiagram id="BPMNDiagram_1"><bpmndi:BPMNPlane id="BPMNPlane_1" bpmnElement="Process_1"><bpmndi:BPMNShape id="_BPMNShape_StartEvent_2" bpmnElement="StartEvent_1"><dc:Bounds height="36.0" width="36.0" x="173.0" y="102.0"/></bpmndi:BPMNShape></bpmndi:BPMNPlane></bpmndi:BPMNDiagram></bpmn:definitions>

schema.title: SophonResult<List<CheckTaskInfo>>
schema.description: The returned data.

RiskLevel.description:
The severity level of the verification information. Valid values:

*   warn: An issue may occur during playbook running.
*   error: The playbook cannot be compiled.
*   remind: The publishing and running of the playbook are not affected. We recommend that you optimize the playbook format.

NodeName.description: The name of the node in the playbook.

Detail.description: The error message returned when the playbook does not pass the check.
Detail.example: Node [python3_3] doesn't have the asset information

VerifyPlaybook.title: VerifyPlaybook

TriggerSophonPlaybook.summary: Triggers a playbook or a command.

schema.description:
The name of the command that you want to trigger.

>  You can call the [DescribeSophonCommands](~~DescribeSophonCommands~~) operation to query the command name.
The input parameters of the command or playbook that you want to trigger.
The custom ID. If you do not specify this parameter when the playbook is triggered, a random ID is generated for fault locating and troubleshooting.

The UUID of the playbook.

>  You can call the [DescribePlaybooks](~~DescribePlaybooks~~)operation to query the playbook UUID.

The task type. Valid values:

*   **command**
*   **playbook**

schema.title: SophonResult<SophonTaskResult>
schema.description: The returned message.

Data.title: 传输的数据
Data.description: The details that is returned after the command or playbook is triggered.

SophonTaskId.description: The custom ID. If you do not specify this parameter when the playbook is triggered, a random ID is generated for fault locating and troubleshooting.

TriggerSophonPlaybook.title: TriggerSophonPlaybook
TriggerSophonPlaybook.description: Before you call this operation, make sure that you understand the billing methods and pricing of Security Orchestration Automation Response (SOAR). For more information, see [Pricing](https://www.alibabacloud.com/en/pricing-calculator?_p_lc=1&spm=a2796.7960336.3034855210.1.7adab91arMeIx2#/commodity/vm_intl).

TriggerPlaybook.summary: Triggers an enabled custom playbook or a predefined playbook.

schema.title: 剧本UUID
schema.description:
The playbook UUID.

>  You can call the [DescribePlaybooks](~~DescribePlaybooks~~) operation to query the playbook UUID.

schema.title: 剧本的入参
schema.description: The input parameters of the playbook.

schema.title: SophonResult<PlaybookTriggerDTO>
schema.description: The returned message.

TriggerUuid.description: The running UUID of the playbook. This parameter is used to query the running result of the playbook.

TriggerPlaybook.title: TriggerPlaybook
TriggerPlaybook.description: Before you call this operation, make sure that you understand the billing methods and pricing of Security Orchestration Automation Response (SOAR). For more information, see [Pricing](https://www.alibabacloud.com/en/pricing-calculator?_p_lc=1&spm=a2796.7960336.3034855210.1.7adab91arMeIx2#/commodity/vm_intl).

RunPython3Script.summary: Submits and runs a Python3 script. You can call this operation only for data processing.

schema.description: The Python3 script.
schema.example:
import logging
def execute (params):
  #ip = params['ip']
  #logging.info("enter execute,ip is "+ip)
  success=True
  message='OK'
  data=[]
  return (success,message,data)

schema.description: The input parameters of the Python3 script.

The UUID of the playbook.

>  You can call the [DescribePlaybooks](~~DescribePlaybooks~~) operation to query the UUIDs of playbooks.
The name of the node in the playbook.

schema.title: SophonResult<String>
schema.description: The response parameters.

RunResult.title: 传输的数据
RunResult.description: The execution result of the Python3 script.

RunPython3Script.title: RunPython3Script
RunPython3Script.description: Before you call this operation, make sure that you understand the billing method and pricing of Security Orchestration Automation Response (SOAR). For more information, see [Pricing](https://www.alibabacloud.com/en/pricing-calculator?_p_lc=1&spm=openapi-amp.newDocPublishment.0.0.4c41281fWhbdPa#/commodity/vm_intl).
RunPython3Script.responseParamsDescription:
The value of **RunResult** is a JSON object, which contains the following fields:

*   **requestUuid**: the UUID of the request, which is used to query operational logs.
*   **content**: the execution result of the Python3 script, which is defined by users.

RevertPlaybookRelease.summary: Rolls back a playbook to a specific version. You can determine whether to publish the new playbook version during the rollback.

schema.title: 剧本UUID
schema.description:
The UUID of the playbook.

>  You can call the [DescribePlaybooks](~~DescribePlaybooks~~)operation to query the playbook UUID.

schema.title: 剧本的发布记录ID
schema.description:
The version of the playbook that you want to publish.

>  You can call the [DescribePlaybookReleases](~~DescribePlaybookReleases~~) operation to query the playbook version.

schema.title: 是否回滚发布
schema.description:
Specifies whether to directly publish the new playbook after the rollback.

*   **true** (default)
*   **false**

schema.title: SophonResult<Void>
schema.description: The response parameters.

RevertPlaybookRelease.title: RevertPlaybookRelease

schema.title: 剧本UUID
schema.description:
The UUID of the playbook.

>  You can call the [DescribePlaybooks](~~DescribePlaybooks~~)operation to query the UUIDs of playbooks.

schema.title: 剧本UUID
schema.description: The new name of the node.

schema.title: 组件节点名
schema.description: The original name of the node.

The language of the content within the request and the response. Valid values:

*   **zh** (default): Chinese
*   **en**: English

schema.description: The response parameters.

RenameResult.description: The returned new name of the node.

QueryTreeData.summary: Queries all playbooks at a time.

schema.description:
The language of the content within the response. Valid values:

*   **zh**: Chinese (default)
*   **en**: English

schema.title: SophonResult<String>
schema.description: The response parameters.

Playbooks.title: 传输的数据
Playbooks.description: The returned information about the playbook. The value is a JSON string.

QueryTreeData.title: QueryTreeData
QueryTreeData.responseParamsDescription:
The following list describes the fields that are contained in the value of the **Playbooks** parameter:

*   **active**: indicates whether the playbook is started. Valid values: **true** and **false**.
*   **displayName**: the playbook name.
*   **playbookUuid**: the playbook UUID.

The playbook UUID.

schema.example: This is a waf processing playbook

ModifyPlaybookInstanceStatus.summary: Modifies the status of a playbook.

schema.title: 剧本UUID
schema.description:
The playbook UUID.

>  You can call the [DescribePlaybooks](~~DescribePlaybooks~~) operation to query the playbook UUID.

schema.title: 剧本启禁用状态
schema.description:
The playbook status. Valid values:

*   **1**: starts the playbook.
*   **0**: stops the playbook.

The language of the content within the request and response. Default value: **zh**. Valid values:

*   **zh**: Chinese
*   **en**: English

schema.title: SophonResult<Void>
schema.description: The response parameters.

ModifyPlaybookInputOutput.summary: Modifies the input and output parameters of a playbook.

schema.title: 剧本UUID
schema.description:
The UUID of the playbook.

>  You can call the [DescribePlaybooks](~~DescribePlaybooks~~)operation to query the playbook UUID.

schema.title: 入参配置
schema.description: The configuration of the input parameters. The value is a JSON array.

schema.title: 出参配置
schema.description: The configuration of the output parameters. This parameter is unavailable. Leave it empty.

The input parameter type.

*   **template-ip**
*   **template-file**
*   **template-process**
*   **custom**
The executed mode of a playbook. The value is a JSON array.

The language of the content within the request and response.

*   **zh**: Chinese (default)
*   **en**: English

schema.title: SophonResult<Void>
schema.description: The response parameters.

ModifyPlaybookInputOutput.title: ModifyPlaybookInputOutput
ModifyPlaybookInputOutput.requestParamsDescription:
The value of the **InputParams** parameter is a JSON array, which contains the following fields:

*   typeName: the name of the parameter type.
*   dataClass: the level of the parameter type. This field is optional. **normal** specifies a common parameter and **custom** specifies a complex parameter.
*   dataType: the data type of the parameter. Valid values: **string, long, int, ip, file, and account**.
*   description: the parameter description.
*   example: the example parameter.
*   name: the parameter name.
*   required: specifies whether the parameter is required. Valid values: **true** and **false**.

The value of the **ExeConfig** parameter is a JSON object, which contains the following fields:
*   executeMode: execution mode, fixed to **mul**.
*   cron: tCRON expression, following CRON standard.

schema.title: 剧本的描述
schema.description: The description of the playbook.

The language of the content within the request and response. Valid values:

*   **en**: English

ModifyComponentAsset.title: ModifyComponentAsset
ModifyComponentAsset.requestParamsDescription:
The following list describes the fields contained in the **AssetConfig** parameter:

*   **name**: the asset name.

*   **componentName**: the component name.

*   **params**: the configuration information. Valid values:

    *   **end_point**: the connection information.
    *   **sub_id**: the AccessKey ID of the account.
    *   **access_key**: the AccessKey secret of the account.

schema.description: The name of the command. Fuzzy match is supported.

schema.title: SophonResult<List<SophonCommandBO>>
schema.description: The response parameters.

DisplayName.description: The display name of the command.

Necessary.description:
Indicates whether the parameter is required. Valid values:

*   **true** (default)
*   **false**

CheckField.description: The regular expression that is used to check the format of the parameter value. If the parameter is left empty, the check is not performed.

Description.example: This is a action of processing for WAF

DescribeSophonCommands.title: DescribeSophonCommands

DescribeSoarTaskAndActions.summary: Queries the execution records of a component during the running of a playbook.

schema.title: 任务请求的UUID
schema.description: The playbook UUID.

The language of the content within the request and response.

*   **zh**: Chinese (default)
*   **en**: English

schema.title: SophonResult<SaoExecuteInfo>
schema.description: The response parameters.

Details.title: 传输的数据
Details.description: The execution details of each task.

TriggerType.description:
The task type. Valid values:

*   **debug**: a debugging task
*   **manual**: a manual task
*   **siem**: an event-triggered task

TaskName.description: The name of the task. The value is the same as the playbook UUID.

StartTime.description: The beginning of the time range during which the playbook is run. The value is a 13-digit timestamp.

EndTime.description: The end of the time range during which the playbook is run. The value is a 13-digit timestamp.

RequestUuid.description: The request ID of the task. The value is unique.

TriggerUser.description: The ID of the Alibaba Cloud account that triggers the task.

ErrorMsg.description: The error message of the task. If the task is successful, this field is empty.

RawEventReq.description: The request parameters of the task.

ResultLevel.description: The flag of the task. For debugging tasks, the value is **DEBUG**. For other tasks, the parameter is left empty.

ResultMessage.description: The returned information about the playbook. You can define the value in the playbook.

TaskTenantId.description: The ID of the Alibaba Cloud account to which the task belongs.

Actions.description: The list of component actions during the running of the playbook.

Action.description: The action name of the component.

StartTime.description: The beginning of the time range during which the component is run. The value is a 13-digit timestamp.

EndTime.description: The end of the time range during which the component is run. The value is a 13-digit timestamp.

Status.description:
The running result of the component. Valid values:

*   **success**
*   **fail**

RequestUuid.description: The request ID of the task. The value is unique.

TriggerUser.description: The ID of the Alibaba Cloud account that is used to execute the task.

TaskName.description: The name of the task. The value is the same as the playbook UUID.

TaskStatus.description:
The status of the triggered component action.

>  This parameter is disabled and left empty.

ActionUuid.description: The UUID of the component execution record.

AssetName.description: The name of the asset that is used by the component.

NodeName.description: The custom name of the node in the component.

TaskFlowMd5.description: The MD5 value of the playbook.

DescribeSoarTaskAndActions.title: DescribeSoarTaskAndActions

DescribeSoarRecords.summary: Queries the execution records of a playbook.

schema.title: 剧本的UUID
schema.description:
The playbook UUID.

>  You can call the [DescribePlaybooks](~~DescribePlaybooks~~) operation to query the playbook UUID.

schema.title: 任务的版本ID
schema.description: The MD5 value of the playbook.

schema.title: 任务开始时间
schema.description: The beginning of the time range to query. The value is a 13-byte timestamp.

schema.title: 任务结束时间
schema.description: The end of the time range to query. The value is a 13-digit timestamp.

The language of the content within the request and response. Default value: **zh**. Valid values:

*   **zh**: Chinese
*   **en**: English
The ID of the Alibaba Cloud account that is used to execute the task.

The status of the task. Valid values:

*   **success**
*   **failed**
*   **inprogress**
The page number. Default value: 1. Pages start from page 1.

The number of entries per page. Default value: 10. If you do not specify the PageSize parameter, 10 entries are returned by default.

>  We recommend that you do not leave this parameter empty.

schema.title: SophonResult<List<SaoExecuteInfo>>
schema.description: The response parameters.

TriggerType.description:
The type of the task. Valid values:

*   **debug**: a debugging task
*   **manual**: a manual task
*   **siem**: a task that is triggered by an event or alert

TaskName.description: The name of the task. The value is the same as the playbook UUID.

StartTime.description: The beginning of the time range to query. The value is a 13-byte timestamp.

EndTime.description: The end of the time range to query. The value is a 13-digit timestamp.

Status.description:
The status of the task. Valid values:

*   **success**
*   **fail**
*   **running**

RequestUuid.description: The request ID of the task. The value is unique.

TriggerUser.description: The ID of the Alibaba Cloud account that is used to execute the task.

ErrorMsg.description: The error message of the task. If the task is successful, this field is empty.

RawEventReq.description: The request parameters of the task.

ResultMessage.description: The returned information about the playbook. You can define the value in the playbook.

TaskType.description:
The type of the task. Valid values:

*   **general**: a common task
*   **standard**: a component task

TaskflowMd5.description: The MD5 value of the playbook.

TotalCount.description: The total number of entries returned.

PageSize.description: The number of entries per page.

DescribeSoarRecords.title: DescribeSoarRecords

DescribeSoarRecordInOutput.summary: Queries the input and output data of a component action. You can call this operation after a playbook is run.

schema.title: 动作的UUID
schema.description:
The UUID of the component action.

>  You can call the [DescribeSoarTaskAndActions](~~DescribeSoarTaskAndActions~~) operation to query the UUIDs of component actions.

The language of the content within the request and the response. Valid values:

*   **zh** (default): Chinese
*   **en**: English

schema.title: SophonResult<String>
schema.description: The response parameters.

InOutputInfo.title: 传输的数据
InOutputInfo.description: The execution result of the component action.

DescribeSoarRecordInOutput.title: DescribeSoarRecordInOutput
DescribeSoarRecordInOutput.responseParamsDescription:
The value of **InOutputInfo** is a JSON string, which contains the following fields:

*   **actionUuid**: the UUID that is generated when the component action is performed.

*   **startTime**: the start time when the action of the component is performed.

*   **taskName**: the task name of the playbook in which the component action is specified.

*   **outputSchema**: the metadata of the output data for the component action. The metadata is in the JSON format and is defined when the playbook is orchestrated.

*   **outputSummary**: the output data of the component action. The data is in the JSON format and contains the following fields:

    *   **datalist**: the details of the output data.
    *   **total_data_successful**: the number of components that are successfully run.
    *   **total_data**: the total number of components that are run.
    *   **total_exe_successful**: the number of times that the running is successful.
    *   **total_exe**: the total number of times for running.
    *   **total_data_with_dup**: the number of times that the data is repeated.
    *   **status**: indicates whether the component is successfully run. Valid values are **true** and **false**.

*   **inputParams**: the input data of the component action. The data is in the JSON format and contains the following fields:

    *   **inputData**: the details of the input data.
    *   **totalSize**: the number of input data entries.

DescribeSoarRecordActionOutputList.summary: Queries the data that is returned when a component initiates an action in a playbook task.

schema.title: 动作的UUID
schema.description:
The UUID of the component action.

>  You can call the [DescribeSoarTaskAndActions](~~DescribeSoarTaskAndActions~~) operation to query the UUID.

The language of the content within the request and response. Default value: **zh**. Valid values:

*   **zh**: Chinese
*   **en**: English

The number of entries per page. Default value: 10. If you leave this parameter empty, 10 entries are returned on each page.

>  We recommend that you do not leave this parameter empty.
The page number. Default value: 1. Pages start from page 1.

schema.title: SophonResult<String>
schema.description: The response parameters.

ActionOutputs.title: 传输的数据
ActionOutputs.description:
The data that is returned when the component action is performed. The value is a JSON array.

>  The format of the output data is determined by the component that is configured when the playbook is written.

PageSize.description: The number of entries per page. Default value: 10.

TotalCount.description: The total number of pages returned.

DescribeSoarRecordActionOutputList.title: DescribeSoarRecordActionOutputList

DescribePopApi.summary: Queries the details of an API operation.

schema.description:
The POP code of the Alibaba Cloud service.

>  You can call the [DescribeApiList](~~DescribeApiList~~) operation to query the POP code.

The version number of the API.

>  You can call the [DescribePopApiVersionList](~~DescribePopApiVersionList~~) operation to query the version number.
The environment in which the API operation parameter is used. Set the value to online.
The operation name of the Alibaba Cloud service.

schema.title: SophonResult<ListApiMetaResponse>
schema.description: The response parameters.

PopCode.description: The POP code of the Alibaba Cloud service.

Required.description:
Indicates whether the parameter is required.

*   true
*   false

Type.description:
The data type of the parameter field. Valid values:

*   **string**
*   **boolean**
*   **integer**
*   **long**

DescribePopApi.title: DescribePopApi

schema.title: 剧本的状态
schema.description:
The status of the playbook. Valid values:

*   **1**: enabled
*   **0**: disabled

schema.title: 剧本的类型
schema.description:
The type of the playbook. Valid values:

*   **preset**: predefined playbook
*   **user**: custom playbook

schema.title: 开始时间
schema.description: The beginning of the time range to query. The value is a 13-digit timestamp.

schema.title: 结束时间
schema.description: The end of the time range to query. The value is a 13-digit timestamp.

schema.title: 剧本UUID
schema.description:
The playbook UUID.

>  You can use the UUID to query the information about a specific playbook.

*   You can call the [DescribePlaybooks](~~DescribePlaybooks~~) operation to query the playbook UUID.

schema.title: 剧本名称
schema.description: The name of the playbook.

The language of the content within the request and response. Default value: **zh**. Valid values:

*   **zh**: Chinese
*   **en**: English

The number of entries per page. Default value: 10. If you leave this parameter empty, 10 entries are returned on each page.

>  We recommend that you do not leave this parameter empty.
The page number. Default value: 1. Pages start from page 1.

schema.title: 排序依据 1-上次修改时间 2-最近执行时间
schema.description:
The sorting basis. Default value: 1. Valid values:

*   1: last modification time
*   2: last execution time

schema.title: 排序逻辑：desc asc,默认desc
schema.description:
The sorting order. Default value: desc. Valid values:

*   desc: descending order
*   asc: ascending order

schema.title: SophonResult<List<PlaybookCloudDTO>>
schema.description: The response parameters.

DisplayName.title: 剧本的名称
DisplayName.description: The display name of the playbook.

OwnType.title: 剧本的权限类型
OwnType.description:
The type of the playbook. Valid values:

*   **preset**: predefined playbook
*   **user**: custom playbook

Active.title: 剧本的启用状态
Active.description:
The playbook status. Valid values:

*   **1**: The playbook is started.
*   **0**: The playbook is stopped.

LastRuntime.title: 剧本的最后执行时间

DescribePlaybookNodesOutput.summary: Queries the historical output data of a component node.

schema.title: 剧本UUID
schema.description:
The UUID of the playbook.

>  You can call the [DescribePlaybooks](~~DescribePlaybooks~~)operation to query the UUIDs of playbooks.

schema.title: 组件节点名
schema.description: The name of the component node.

The language of the content within the request and response. Default value: **zh**. Valid values:

*   **zh**: Chinese
*   **en**: English

schema.title: SophonResult<PlaybookNodeOutput>
schema.description: The response parameters.

PlaybookNodesOutput.title: 传输的数据
PlaybookNodesOutput.description: The output data of the component node.

NodeName.description: The name of the component node.

NodeOutput.description: The historical output data of the component node. The value is in the JSON string format. If no data is found, the parameter is left empty.

DescribePlaybookNodesOutput.title: DescribePlaybookNodesOutput
DescribePlaybookNodesOutput.responseParamsDescription:
The value of **NodeOutput** is a JSON object, which contains the following fields:

*   **datalist**: the details of output data.
*   **total_data_successful**: the number of components that are successfully run.
*   **total_data**: the total number of components that are run.
*   **total_exe_successful**: the number of times that the running is successful.
*   **total_exe**: the total number of times for running.
*   **total_data_with_dup**: the number of times that the data is repeated.
*   **status**: indicates whether the component is successfully run. Valid values: **true** and **false**.

DescribePlaybookMetrics.summary: Queries the metrics of a playbook. The metrics include the playbook name, playbook description, the number of times that the playbook is run, and the failure rate of the playbook.

schema.title: 剧本UUID
schema.description:
The UUID of the playbook.

>  You can call the [DescribePlaybooks](~~DescribePlaybooks~~)operation to query the UUIDs of playbooks.

The language of the content within the request and response. Default value: **zh**. Valid values:

*   **zh**: Chinese
*   **en**: English

schema.title: SophonResult<PlaybookCloudDTO>
schema.description: The response parameters.

OwnType.title: 剧本的权限类型
OwnType.description:
The type of the playbook. Valid values:

*   **preset**: predefined playbook
*   **user**: custom playbook

Active.title: 剧本的启用状态
Active.description:
The status of the playbook. Valid values:

*   **1**: enabled
*   **0**: disabled

LastRuntime.title: 剧本的最后执行时间
LastRuntime.description: The time when the playbook was last run. The value is a 13-digit timestamp.

GmtCreate.title: 剧本创建时间
GmtCreate.description: The time when the playbook was created. The value is a 13-digit timestamp.

HistoryMd5.title: 剧本历史版本数
HistoryMd5.description: The number of historical versions of the playbook.

SuccNum.title: 剧本执行成功数
SuccNum.description: The number of the tasks that are created for the playbook and were successfully run.

FailNum.title: 剧本执行失败数
FailNum.description: The number of the tasks that are created for the playbook and failed to run.

Description.example: This is a playbook for waf processing

DescribePlaybookInputOutput.summary: Queries the input and output parameter configurations of a playbook.

schema.title: 剧本UUID
schema.description:
The UUID of the playbook.

>  You can call the [DescribePlaybooks](~~DescribePlaybooks~~)operation to query the UUIDs of playbooks.

The language of the content within the request and response. Default value: **zh**. Valid values:

*   **zh**: Chinese
*   **en**: English

schema.title: SophonResult<PlaybookInputOutputDTO>
schema.description: The response parameters.

ParamType.title: 输入类型
ParamType.description:
The input parameter type of the playbook. Valid values:

*   **template-ip**
*   **template-file**
*   **template-process**
*   **custom**

ExeConfig.title: 输入类型
ExeConfig.description: The execution method of the playbook is in JSONObject format.

InputParams.title: 入参配置
InputParams.description: The input parameter configuration of the playbook. The value is a JSON array.

OutputParams.title: 出参配置
OutputParams.description: The output parameter configuration. This parameter is unavailable and is always left empty.

DescribePlaybookInputOutput.title: DescribePlaybookInputOutput
DescribePlaybookInputOutput.responseParamsDescription:
The value of **InputParams** is a JSON array, which contains the following fields:

*   typeName: the data type name of the parameter.
*   dataClass: the level of the parameter type. Valid values are **normal** and **custom**. The value normal indicates a common parameter, and the value custom indicates a complex parameter.
*   dataType: the type of the parameter. Valid values are **string, long, int, ip, file, and account**.
*   description: the description of the parameter.
*   example: the example value of the parameter.
*   name: the name of the parameter.
*   required: specifies whether the parameter is required. Valid values are **true** and **false**.

DescribePlaybook.summary: Queries the XML configuration of a playbook.

schema.title: 剧本UUID
schema.description:
The UUID of the playbook.

>  You can call the [DescribePlaybooks](~~DescribePlaybooks~~)operation to query the UUIDs of playbooks.

The language of the content within the request and response. Default value: **zh**. Valid values:

*   **zh**: Chinese
*   **en**: English
The MD5 hash value of the playbook.

The flag that indicates whether the playbook is of the debugging or published version. Valid values:

*   **1**: playbook of the debugging version
*   **0**: playbook of the published version

schema.title: SophonResult<PlaybookDetailDTO>
schema.description: The response parameters.

GmtCreate.description: The creation time of the playbook. The value is a 13-digit timestamp.

GmtModified.description: The modification time of the playbook. The value is a 13-digit timestamp.

Taskflow.description: The XML configuration of the playbook.
Taskflow.example: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><bpmn:definitions xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:bpmn="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL" xmlns:bpmndi="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/DI" xmlns:dc="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DC" targetNamespace="http://bpmn.io/schema/bpmn" id="Definitions_1"><bpmn:process id="Process_1" isExecutable="false"><bpmn:startEvent id="StartEvent_1"/></bpmn:process><bpmndi:BPMNDiagram id="BPMNDiagram_1"><bpmndi:BPMNPlane id="BPMNPlane_1" bpmnElement="Process_1"><bpmndi:BPMNShape id="_BPMNShape_StartEvent_2" bpmnElement="StartEvent_1"><dc:Bounds height="36.0" width="36.0" x="173.0" y="102.0"/></bpmndi:BPMNShape></bpmndi:BPMNPlane></bpmndi:BPMNDiagram></bpmn:definitions>

TaskflowType.description:
The playbook configuration type.
*   **xml**: XML format.
*   **x6**: JSON format.

Creator.description: The ID of the Alibaba Cloud account that is used to create the playbook.

OwnType.description:
The type of the playbook. Valid values:

*   **preset**: predefined playbook
*   **user**: custom playbook

SuccessExeNum.description: The number of times that the playbook was successfully run.

FailExeNum.description: The number of times that the playbook failed to be run.

LastExeTime.description: The time when the playbook was last run. The value is a 13-digit timestamp.

Modifier.description: The ID of the Alibaba Cloud account that is used to modify the playbook.

DisplayName.description: The display name of the playbook.

InputParams.description:
The input parameter configuration of the playbook. The value is a JSON array.

>  For more information, see [DescribePlaybookInputOutput](~~DescribePlaybookInputOutput~~).

OnlineActive.description:
The status of the playbook. Valid values:

*   **0**: disabled
*   **1**: enabled

OnlineReleaseTaskflowMd5.description: The MD5 hash value in the latest published version of the playbook.

DescribeComponentList.summary: Queries a list of common components that are available.

schema.title: 剧本UUID

DescribeComponentList.title: DescribeComponentList
DescribeComponentList.responseParamsDescription:
The value of **Components** is a JSON string, which contains the following fields:

*   **actions**: the actions that are supported by the component. The value is a JSON array and contains the following fields:

    *   **description**: the description of the action.

    *   **name**: the name of the action.

    *   **parameters**: the input parameters of the action. The value is a JSON object and contains the following fields:

        *   **description**: the description of the input parameter.
        *   **name**: the name of the input parameter.
        *   **required**: specifies whether the input parameter is required. Valid values are true and false.

*   **basic**: the basic information of the component. The value contains the following fields:

*   **description**: the description of the component.

*   **logo**: the address information of the component logo.

*   **name**: the name of the component.

schema.description:
The ID of the first version.

>  You can call the [DescribePlaybookReleases](~~DescribePlaybookReleases~~) operation to query the IDs of versions. The system automatically generates IDs for new versions.

schema.title: 新版本的ID
schema.description:
The ID of the second version.

>  You can call the [DescribePlaybookReleases](~~DescribePlaybookReleases~~) operation to query the IDs of versions. The system automatically generates IDs for new versions.

The language of the content within the request and response. Valid values:

*   **zh** (default): Chinese
*   **en**: English

schema.title: SophonResult<CompareResult>
schema.description: The response parameters.

Same.description:
Indicates whether the configurations of the two versions are the same. Valid values:

*   **true**
*   **false**

New.description:
Indicates whether the second version provides more information than the first version. Valid values:

*   **true**
*   **false**

Description.description: The description of the comparison result.
Description.example: The first version adds one node compared to the second version

ComparePlaybooks.title: ComparePlaybooks

BatchModifyInstanceStatus.summary: Modifies the statuses of playbooks at a time.

schema.title: 剧本UUID
schema.description:
The playbook UUID. If you want to specify multiple playbooks, separate the playbook UUIDs with commas (,).

>  You can call the [DescribePlaybooks](~~DescribePlaybooks~~)operation to query the playbook UUID.

schema.title: 剧本启禁用状态
schema.description:
Specifies whether to start or stop the playbook.

*   **0**: stops the playbook.
*   **1**: starts the playbook.

The language of the content within the request and response. Valid values:

*   **zh**: Chinese (default)
*   **en**: English

schema.title: SophonResult<Void>
schema.description: The response parameters.

BatchModifyInstanceStatus.title: BatchModifyInstanceStatus

schema.title: 剧本名称
schema.description: The name of the playbook.

schema.title: 剧本的描述
schema.description: The description of the playbook.

The language of the content within the response. Valid values:

*   **zh** (default): Chinese
*   **en**: English

schema.title: SophonResult<PlaybookCloudDTO>
schema.description: The response parameters.

DescribeComponentsJs.summary: Queries the JavaScript file of a component. The component uses the returned JavaScript file for page rendering.

schema.description:
The language of the content within the request and response. Valid values:

*   **zh**: Chinese (default)
*   **en**: English

schema.title: SophonResult<String>
schema.description: The response parameters.

ComponentsJs.title: 传输的数据
ComponentsJs.description: The configuration of the JavaScript file for the component.

DescribeComponentsJs.title: DescribeComponentsJs
DescribeComponentsJs.responseParamsDescription:
The value of the **ComponentsJs** parameter is a JSON array, which contains the following fields:

*   **js**: the URL of the JavaScript file.
*   **name**: the name of the component.
*   **ownType**: the type of component. The value is fixed as **sys**. Components of other types are unavailable.

DescribeProcessTaskCount.summary: Queries the number of handling tasks based on handling entity UUIDs.
DescribeProcessTaskCount.title: DescribeProcessTaskCount

DescribeProcessTasks.summary: Queries the information about handling tasks. When you use Security Orchestration Automation Response (SOAR) to handle events, handling tasks are generated in the handling center.

schema.title: 处置策略ID
schema.description:
The UUID of the handling policy.

>  You can call the [ListDisposeStrategy](~~2584440~~) operation to query the UUID of the handling policy.

schema.title: 实体的名称
schema.description: The name of the handling entity.

schema.title: 实体的类型
schema.description:
The type of the handling entity. Valid values:

*   **ip**
*   **file**
*   **process**

schema.title: 处置场景
schema.description:
The scenario code of the handling task.

>  You can call the [DescribeEnumItems](~~DescribeEnumItems~~) operation to query the scenario code of the handling task. This parameter is available when you set **EnumType** to **process**.

schema.title: 任务状态 list
schema.description:
The status of the handling task. The value is a string. Valid values:

*   **11**: being handled
*   **21**: being blocked
*   **22**: being quarantined
*   **23**: completed
*   **24**: added to the whitelist
*   **20**: successful
*   **90**: failed
*   **91**: unblocking failed
*   **92**: restoring quarantined files failed

schema.title: 作用域
schema.description: The ID of the Alibaba Cloud account that is specified in the handling task.

schema.title: 处置来源 list
schema.description:
The triggering source of the handling task. The value is a string array. Valid values:

*   **system**: triggered when you manually handle an event
*   **custom**: triggered by an event based on an automatic response rule
*   **custom_alert**: triggered by an alert based on an automatic response rule
*   **soar-manual**: triggered when you use SOAR to manually run a playbook
*   **soar-mdr**: triggered by Managed Security Service

schema.title: 处置时间的查询开始时间
schema.description: The beginning of the time range for a handling task. The value is a 13-digit timestamp.

schema.title: 处置时间的查询结束时间
schema.description: The end of the time range for a handling task. The value is a 13-digit timestamp.

schema.title: 解封时间的查询开始时间
schema.description: The beginning of the time range for an unblocking task. The value is a 13-digit timestamp.

schema.title: 解封时间的查询结束时间
schema.description: The end of the time range for an unblocking task. The value is a 13-digit timestamp.

schema.title: 模糊查询
schema.description: The handling entity, handling scenario, or handling parameter that is used for fuzzy match.

The number of entries per page. Default value: 10. If you do not specify the PageSize parameter, 10 entries are returned by default.

>  We recommend that you do not leave this parameter empty.
The page number. Default value: 1. Pages start from page 1.

The cloud service that is associated with the handling task. The value is a string. Valid values:

*   **WAF**: Web Application Firewall (WAF)
*   **CFW**: Cloud Firewall
*   **Aegis**: Security Center

The unique identifier of the handling task.

>  This parameter is used to query a specific task. You can obtain the value from the response result.

The field that you use to sort the result.

>  You can obtain the field from the response result.

The sort order. Valid values:

*   **desc** (default)
*   **asc**

schema.title: SophonResult<List<ProcessTaskDTO>>
schema.description: The response parameters.

TaskId.description: The unique identifier of the handling task.

Creator.title: 任务的创建人
Creator.description: The ID of the Alibaba Cloud account that is used to submit the handling task.

GmtCreateMillis.title: 任务创建时间
GmtCreateMillis.description: The creation time of the handling task. The value is a 13-digit timestamp.

GmtModifiedMillis.title: 任务修复时间
GmtModifiedMillis.description: The modification time of the handling task. The value is a 13-digit timestamp.

YunCode.title: 关联产品
YunCode.description: The code of the cloud service that is associated with the handling task.

EntityName.title: 处置的实体名称
EntityName.description: The name of the handling entity.

EntityType.title: 处置的实体类型
EntityType.description: The type of the handling entity.

TaskStatus.title: 任务状态
TaskStatus.description: The status of the handling task.

Scope.title: 作战域
Scope.description: The ID of the Alibaba Cloud account that is specified in the handling task.

InputParams.title: 任务的入参
InputParams.description: The input parameter of the handling task.

SceneCode.title: 处置场景
SceneCode.description: The scenario code of the handling task.

SceneName.title: 处置场景名称
SceneName.description: The scenario name of the handling task.

ProcessTime.title: 处置时间
ProcessTime.description: The delivery time of the handling task. The value is a 13-digit timestamp.

RemoveTime.title: 解除时间
RemoveTime.description: The unblocking time of the handling task. The value is a 13-digit timestamp.

ProcessStrategyUuid.title: 关联的策略ID
ProcessStrategyUuid.description: The ID of the associated policy.

Source.description: The submission source of the handling task.

ErrCode.description: The error code returned if the call failed.

ErrMsg.description: The error message returned if the call failed.
ErrMsg.example: ParamError : The parameters of your request are invalid

ErrTip.description: The error tip returned if the call failed.
ErrTip.example: Verify that the input parameters of the components are correct

TotalCount.description: The total number of entries returned.

PageSize.description: The number of entries per page.

DescribeProcessTasks.title: DescribeProcessTasks

TriggerProcessTask.summary: Performs an action on a handling task that is generated by the handling center when an event is handled by using Security Orchestration Automation Response (SOAR). For example, you can call this operation to cancel blocking or isolation, or retry blocking.

schema.description:
The ID of the handling task.

>  You can call the [DescribeProcessTasks](~~DescribeProcessTasks~~) operation to query the IDs of handling tasks.

schema.title: 处置类型
schema.description:
The type of the action. Valid values:

*   **remove**: cancels blocking or isolation.
*   **retry**: submits the task again.

schema.title: SophonResult<Void>
schema.description: The response parameters.

TriggerProcessTask.title: TriggerProcessTask

ConvertPlaybook.summary: Converts the playbook flowchart configuration format from XML to X6. This is used to ensure compatibility with historical data, as earlier versions of the playbook used the XML format, which was later changed to the X6 format.

schema.title: 剧本编辑配置
schema.example:
<?xml version=\"1.0\" encoding=\"UTF-8\"?>
<bpmn:definitions xmlns:xsi=\"http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance\" xmlns:bpmn=\"http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL\" xmlns:bpmndi=\"http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/DI\" xmlns:dc=\"http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DC\" id=\"Definitions_1\" targetNamespace=\"http://bpmn.io/schema/bpmn\">
  <bpmn:process id=\"Process_1\" isExecutable=\"false\">
    <bpmn:startEvent id=\"StartEvent_1\" />
  </bpmn:process>
  <bpmndi:BPMNDiagram id=\"BPMNDiagram_1\">
     <bpmndi:BPMNPlane id=\"BPMNPlane_1\" bpmnElement=\"Process_1\">
           <bpmndi:BPMNShape id=\"_BPMNShape_StartEvent_2\" bpmnElement=\"StartEvent_1\">
                   <dc:Bounds x=\"173\" y=\"102\" width=\"36\" height=\"36\" />
            </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
     </bpmndi:BPMNPlane>
  </bpmndi:BPMNDiagram>
</bpmn:definitions>

schema.title: SophonResult<String>
schema.description: SophonResult<String>

ConvertPlaybook.title: ConvertPlaybook
